description: This is the simplest design of a mob/session livestock treatment record, based entirely on the ICAR icarTreatmentEventResource and its accompanying data types. There's no allowance for diagnoses, multiple treatments in a programme, planned treatments, etc.

quantity.description: The number of animal set members.

name.description: Human readable name of the set (for example, mob or group name).

class.description: An inventory classification for the animals in the set (if they are the same class).

member.description: As per JSON-LD Hydra syntax, member provides the array of objects, in this case animals assigned to the set.
